messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: fair market value on......
messages.msgSnippet: Milt- Throw in the gold dragon tsuba for $325, and you ve got a deal. Save yourself a slot from papering the tsuba since they will probably only alot 10 slots.
messages.messageBody:
Milt-

Throw in the gold dragon tsuba for $325, and you've
got a deal. Save yourself a slot from papering the
tsuba since they will probably only alot 10 slots.

Actually, I'll take the Meibutsu if you include
shipping.

I must be slipping: I don't here the bagpipes
a'playin.

Curran

messages.subject: RE: [nihontostudy] fair market value on......
messages.msgSnippet: Damn.  I had started putting the date and purchase price in my books in the last few years.  Unfortunately, it wasn t in this book.  I do remember buying it in
messages.messageBody:
Damn. I had started putting the date and purchase price in my books in the
last few years. Unfortunately, it wasn't in this book. I do remember
buying it in early 2002 from Satcho. Maybe check with them?



I checked there website and Michael doesn't have a copy currently available.
He would, however, know what they sell for.



http://www.satcho.com/



Jim
